resources.string: What is your worse time of day?
What do you think about often?
What are things you find on the floor outside?
What are things you find in the sky?
What is something you press on?
What do you never have time to finish?
What do you enjoy talking about?
Enter E-mail address below to send story to yourself or a friend.

So I wanted to tell a story about something but had no idea what to write about, so I decided to just make \'something\' up. Everyday I wake up thinking why is it %s already, then I realize that I am a whole day older today. I lay there and think about my %s and what the hell I am doing here. So I close my eyes and go right back to sleep. Dream time! Yaaaay! My favorite time of day. Jumping over %s and flying through %s , I realize how amazing dream-land can really be. Finding myself typing on a %s , click click click is all I hear. As he drinks his bottle and hums a rhythm. Hurry up and eat little boy, so I can get this %s done. Okay. Stop! Its play time. Time for mental release and %s talk. I love these moments of time. Am I awake or still asleep? Not quite sure but time keeps flying and so do I.
